Atomix API Reference (latest)

Atomix core 
Package Description
io.atomix
Core Atomix APIs, including AtomixClient and AtomixReplica.
Resource API 
Package Description
io.atomix.resource
Provides classes and interfaces for creating and operating on Raft replicated state machines.
Distributed resources 
Package Description
io.atomix.collections
Provides distributed collections such as DistributedMap DistributedMultiMap, DistributedQueue, and DistributedSet.
io.atomix.coordination
Provides distributed coordination resources such as DistributedLock and DistributedLeaderElection, DistributedMembershipGroup, DistributedMessageBus for unreliable messaging, and DistributedTopic for publish-subscribe messaging.
Other Packages 
Package Description
io.atomix.primitives
Provides distributed variables such as DistributedValue and DistributedLong.
